# cmccloudv2_waf_rule (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# create a waf rule
resource "cmccloudv2_waf_rule" "rule_1" {
    waf_id                       = "35d40c01-dc76-4478-9864-20f0870586aa"
    message                      = "test rule"
    detection                    = "detect str"
    action                       = "BLOCK"
    description                  = "des"
    match_request_body           = true
    match_get_arguments          = true
    match_http_headers           = true
    match_filename               = true
    match_url                    = true
    match_name_check             = true
    match_header_cookie          = false
    match_header_content_type    = false
    match_header_user_agent      = false
    match_header_accept_encoding = true
    match_header_connection      = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `action` (String) The action of the WAF rule, BLOCK or LOG
- `detection` (String) The detection of the WAF rule
- `message` (String) The message of the WAF rule
- `waf_id` (String) The ID of the WAF

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the WAF rule
- `match_filename` (Boolean) If true, it will match the filename
- `match_get_arguments` (Boolean) If true, it will match the GET arguments
- `match_header_accept_encoding` (Boolean) If true, it will match the header accept encoding
- `match_header_connection` (Boolean) If true, it will match the header connection
- `match_header_content_type` (Boolean) If true, it will match the header content type
- `match_header_cookie` (Boolean) If true, it will match the header cookie
- `match_header_user_agent` (Boolean) If true, it will match the header user agent
- `match_http_headers` (Boolean) If true, it will match the HTTP headers
- `match_name_check` (Boolean) If true, it will match the name check
- `match_request_body` (Boolean) If true, it will match the request body
- `match_url` (Boolean) If true, it will match the URL
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
